alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 17 at 2:01PM AKST until November 18 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Rain, freezing rain, and snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills. Freezing rain is expected in Unalakleet, with a chance of freezing rain in other areas. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Driving and walking surfaces will become very slippery as ice forms on the ground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain and freezing rain will develop this morning, then change to snow on Friday. Freezing rain is likely in Unalakleet, with just a chance of freezing rain in other areas.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills
